These systems include the obvious things like plumbing, electrical, and ventilation, but also common things already on some maps, like emergency escape pods and crew quarters.

169891.name: Aetherology
169891.description:
From publisher blurb:

Stretch Your Reality

There are waking dreams, there are active hallucinations, there are feverish visions that cannot be classified. And then there are the metaplanes, an adrenaline-fused combination of all of these, and more. Everything you dream of, everything you fear, everything beautiful and everything grotesque can be found out there. If you travel to the planes, you may lose your life, lose your mind, or if you’re lucky, just lose your way. But you may find hidden secrets of magic and perhaps make powerful allies. It’ll be a change from everyday life in the sprawls of the Sixth World, but may well be worth it. Are you ready for something entirely different?

Aetherology offers a grand tour of many metaplanes—the wild, the weird, the dangerous, and the everything in between. Prepare for mind-bending journeys to alternate realms of existence and the opportunity to encounter a new host of dangerous spirits and creatures. With rules on astral phemonena and new powers for the critters detailed in the book, Aetherology offers a whole new twist to your Shadowrun games.

Aetherology is dual-statted, meaning the spirits and creatures inside can be used in both Shadowrun, Fifth Edition and Shadowrun, Twentieth Anniversary Edition.

169892.name: Birthday of the Goblin Princess

rpgseries.26172: RPG Geek Fiasco Playset Contest 2014: Celebrations

169892.description: Birthday of the Goblin Princess is a submission to the RPG Geek Fiasco Playset Contest 2014: Celebrations that took place in November 2014.

rpgseries.26172: RPG Geek Fiasco Playset Contest 2014: Celebrations

169893.name: The Last Campfire
169893.description: It’s the final week of the season at Camp Conestoga. The campers and staff are all preparing for the end of their four week program. The final campfire is soon and with it the end of the summer. With the end of the summer comes the last chance to make your move, gain revenge, or make a name for yourself for next summer.

169894.name: Uhrwerk! Das Magazin (Ausgabe 4 - 2014)
169894.description: The fourth issue, focusing on the element ice, contains setting information (including monsters, plants etc.) and short stories for Splittermond, Myranor, Tharun, Malmsturm, Deadlands (also a scenario for DL), Space 1889, Contact, and Sea Dracula.

169895.description:
Los Cagones is a strategic area control game of control for two people, quick to learn and play, where you have to build a single toilet for each of your two cagones before your opponent does..

At the end of a round, when a player gets both his cagones enclosed with walls on all sides, with a latrine and without any other Cagon, the game ends and that player wins.

Spanish description:
"Los Cagones" es un juego estratégico de control de áreas para dos personas , rápido de aprender y jugar, donde tendrás que construir una letrina individual para cada uno de tus dos cagones antes que lo haga el contrario.

Cuando un jugador consiga que sus dos cagones estén al final de un turno protegidos por todos sus lados con muros (las piezas del juego), cada uno en un letrina cerrada y sin compartir espacio con ningún otro Cagón, ya sea del tipo que sea, gana el juego y finaliza la partida.
169895.name: Los Cagones

169897.description:
This promo pack for Demigods Rising includes human heroes from the world of Argalla. It is fully compatible with the print and play version of the game.

Pack contains:
Weaponsmith
Crossbowman
Assassin
Priestess
Paladin
Knight
169897.name: Demigods Rising: Heroes of Humans

169898.description:
This promo pack for Demigods Rising includes elven heroes from the world of Argalla. It is fully compatible with the print and play version of the game.

Pack contains:
Fire Elemental
Ice Elemental
Pegasus Knight
High Elder
Sentinel
Wind
Fairy
169898.name: Demigods Rising: Heroes of Elves

169899.description:
This promo pack for Demigods Rising includes dwarven heroes from the world of Argalla. It is fully compatible with the print and play version of the game.

Pack contains:
Blacksmith
Alchemist
Guardian
Engineer
Charger
Gunner
169899.name: Demigods Rising: Heroes of Dwarves

169900.description:
This promo pack for Demigods Rising includes orc heroes from the world of Argalla. It is fully compatible with the print and play version of the game.

Pack contains:
Overlord
Black Wolf
Stoneskin
Trapper
Ogre
169900.name: Demigods Rising: Heroes of Orcs

169901.name: A Pyramid Named Desire

rpgseries.26172: RPG Geek Fiasco Playset Contest 2014: Celebrations

169901.description:
Designer Summary

THE SCORE
The dawn of a new era beckons. This golden age for your people and the birth-day of your God King combine to mark an eternal moment in history, heavy with gravitas and significance, crowned with the ongoing building of the Pyramids under the watchful eye of the eternal Sphinx. The Pharaoh’s chief butler and his chief baker press all manner of servants to the task of the feast, while soldiers drum and the people dance in the street to the songs of priests.

But you just want to get it on.
Let’s play!

169902.name: The Labyrinth of Time
169902.description:
User Summary

You are chosen to be a hero, with your subway car you have come before an illusion showing himself as Deadalus that explains that the Greek King Minos commissioned a labyrinth that has accesses in all of space and time. When it's complete King Minos will then invade and conquer all times and places with his army. Deadalus calls upon you as the player to stop him by destroying the labyrinth.

Upon its construction, King Minos will invade and conquer all times and places with his supernatural army. Daedalus pleads for the player to find a way to destroy the labyrinth before Minos can complete his conquest.

169903.name: Snowcat Simulator
169903.description:
User Summary

You drive a snowcat, one of those machines that prepares ski slopes. It's up to you to get everything ready so thousands of skiers can get down the slopes everyday. For this you must learn to handle the right machine for the right job. There are snowcats in various shapes and sizes as well as snowblowers to keep the area and roads clear.

169904.name: London Falling
169904.description:
From publisher blurb:

Smoke & Shadows

London—where the thick fog (sounds nicer than smog, doesn’t it) makes for some truly deep shadows. Every crooked street, every cramped building holds a secret or two, as well as a person or two who will go to great lengths to ensure those secrets are kept. There is, for instance, the dark secret of a minor noble who has not been seen in Parliament in months. And the researcher who has a startlingly large amount of people interested in his work. The courier who carries one secret in his head and another in his gut. And an explosive secret that has been festering in the West End Underplex for years or even decades.

Skilled runners have the chance to uncover these secrets and more, but they’d better be ready for the forces of the world that would prefer to keep things covered up. They are tenacious, dangerous, and, perhaps most surprising for England, not at all polite.

London Falling features four adventures for Shadowrun set in London. Initially designed especially for gaming conventions, these adventures are now available to all players who want to dive in and see if they can survive the challenges of the Big Smoke. London Falling has stats that allow it to be compatible for both Shadowrun, Fifth Edition and Shadowrun, Twentieth Anniversary Edition.

169905.name: Airport Simulator 2014
169905.description:
The rumbling sounds of the jet engines, the changing weather conditions, and the booming turbine noise all present a fascinating atmosphere filled with rapid change and constant challenges.

Face the demands as you take the helm! The planes, the vehicles, the passengers! Step into the shoes of an airport employee and handle all the responsibilities and daily routines at a modern, international airport.

Refuel super jumbos, coordinate ground crew, air traffic and technical staff - even organize perfect catering. Manage all the details and operate all the equipment right down to the fuel trucks and jetways. Control the bustling activity that flows through each gate and into the blue in this amazingly i n-depth simulation – complete with new aircraft, vehicles, and machinery.

Managing all the activities at this airport will present you with countless new challenges! Clever tactical planning and forward thinking are essential to reach your goals and expand your operation.

Remember, to reach the friendly skies – you have to first get to the gate!

Source: The Publisher Website.

169907.name: Savage Island
169907.description:
From publisher blurb:


Sandbox Fantasy

After being cast adrift by pirates, a party of adventurers washes up on the shore of a strange island. With no food, no water and no idea where they are, the adventurers must contend with homicidal natives, four-armed giant apes, magical towers, ancient ruins and more.

There are several ways to escape the island and 36 locations to explore.

6 Pre-Gen Characters
7 Fantasy Character Paths

169908.name: American Trucker Simulator 2014
169908.description:
Head off to the countryside – jump into your truck and drive all kinds of freight throughout the US: Heavy trailers with machines, fruit and vegetables or luxury goods.

As you go along you’ll get profitable orders to earn your wages and buy new tractor units to get the real big deals.

Whether you’re driving up in the cool north or down in the hot deserts you’ll need to get a grip!

Source: The Developer Website.

169909.name: Infinite Scuba
169909.description:
Infinite Scuba is a reality-based, environmentally-respectful video game that enables players to experience the beauty, mystery, and serenity of scuba diving and artifact discovery in exotic real-world locations. Players use and collect branded scuba gear, identify wildlife, and take photos to share with friends, while learning about history and dive science.

Source: The Publisher Website.

169910.name: Quantum Flux
169910.description:
From publisher blurb:


Sci-Fi Horror

It is the year 2270 and the Terran Stella Navy (TSN) salvage ship Oculas is assigned to recover the TSN Leopold, a ship thought lost nearly twenty years ago. The briefing is simple:

Find the ship, discover what happened, recover the A.I. Core and either bring the ship home or scuttle it

What could possibly go wrong? (Other than a drive malfunction, killer aliens and a deranged A.I.)

6 Pre-Gen Characters
11 Decks To Explore

169911.name: The Road To Petra
169911.description:
From publisher blurb:


Modern Horror Investigation

During the filming of a new show for the Mystery! Science! TV channel, the world slowly unravels for the characters.

As everything they believe in is stripped away, the characters must fight to remember what it means to be human.

The Road To Petra is a modern horror adventure which focuses on role playing and investigation with little or no combat.

6 Pre-Gen Characters

169912.name: Woodcutter Simulator 2013
169912.description:
In “Woodcutter Simulator 2013“ one of the hardest and most dangerous jobs in the world waits for you: Lumber-jacking. Take control of a complete wood processing plant and fulfil various missions.

With your chainsaw fell the trees directly. Use the best equipment and the right trucks to get the lumber to the wood yard. So get in the truck and get stuck in: It’s time to earn money and run the business.

Source: The Publisher Website.

169913.name: Waterpark Simulator
169913.description:
Build and manage your own swimmingarea! Create swimming pool, diving facilities, attractions and food stalls to lure guests into the bath and to keep them happy. Supervision, order and cleanliness, the beach staff, everything is managed by you. Sun & Fun - However, not every summer brings with it lots of sun.

The weather can quickly make you a spanner in the works and distribute the bathers. Pay attention to the needs of visitors, so they are always happy and satisfied and come back again.

Waterpark Simulator - the fun simulation around a popular water park!me back again.

Source: The Publisher Website.

169914.name: New York Traffic Simulator
169914.description:
BECOME THE MOST POPULAR CABBLE IN NEW YORK

Are you ready for the city that never sleeps? The Ultimate New York Traffic bundle takes you to the world metropolis. Whether morning, noon or night - New York‘s population needs your services!

Whether by bus or taxi - transport customers promptly and safely to their final destinations ! Control your bus and taxi through New York City!

Heavy traffic, one-way streets and a city that never sleeps are waiting for you! Get behind the wheel of a bus line and move the residents of New York to their final destination. Pay attention to traffic rules, pedestrian and above all the time! Punctuality is required and rewarded! Experience the realistic feel and control your bus with a lot of sensitivity and concentration through the streets of New York!

Source: The Publisher Website.

169915.name: Aviator - Bush Pilot
169915.description:
User Summary

In Aviator you make your living as a bush pilot. You get challenging jobs like fighting bush fires, transport goods, find missing people & items, serve as a first responder & wildlife preservationist, or simply take some snapshots of archaeological finds.

You start of with small planes but with succes come upgrades and better and bigger planes.

169916.name: Universal Adventures Tunnels of the Ratlings
169916.description:
From publisher blurb:

Beneath the streets of human towns and cities, beneath even the holds of the dwarf lords, legends tell of twisting tunnels and dank chambers, of vast caverns and inhuman cities, where a wicked race of rat-like humanoids dwell. Vile and vicious, the ratlings are said to have an extensive civilization in the deep places of the earth. And there their leaders plot the conquest of the surface world.

Welcome to Universal Adventures Tunnels of the Ratlings!

Delve into the tunnels beneath the settlements of the civilized world in search of an elusive foe. Legends tell of a vile race said to be responsible for plagues and abductions, fires and engineering calamities, and sudden attacks on settlements where both the populace and attackers have vanished without a trace. Seek ye the foul ratlings in Universal Adventures Tunnels of the Ratlings. Universal Adventures Tunnels of the Ratlings includes 18 Encounter Cards, 18 Event Cards, 9 Spell Cards and 9 Search Cards. With the cards you can generate encounters, events, and the results of search actions as adventurers explore the tunnels or any other adventure you care to use the cards with. In addition, you can use the spells with the ratling warlocks, or any other spell casters that cast spells of darkness. The Spell cards are also a preview of the upcoming Ogres and Underwords Realm of Darkness. For use with any fantasy adventure rpg, Tunnels of the Ratlings can be used independently or in conjunction with other Universal Adventures products. Use the Dungeon Deck to create the tunnel complex or use a map of your own. With Universal Adventures products you’ll always have a way to play your favorite fantasy rpg’s.

rpgseries.26172: RPG Geek Fiasco Playset Contest 2014: Celebrations

169917.name: Reunion: Class of 1994
169917.description:
designer blurb

A playset for the Fiasco roleplaying game by Jason Morningstar. Playset written by Zach W. Lorton for the RPGGeek Fiasco Playset Contest 2014: Celebrations.

From the playset description:
"Nobody owned a cell phone, parents trusted us when we went out at night without the use of GPS tracking, and our social network was our home phones -- that is, if we were lucky enough to have a job to pay for a separate landline at the house. Music was changing for the better, movies were getting wider, and TV was getting riskier. We always had to look up the phone number to the neighbourhood pizza joint in something called a “phone book”, but we had our friends’ phone numbers memorized. We were less than ten years away from a technological revolution that would make our world seem quaint, and we were none the wiser. High School was all we knew.

This suburban high school class has had its share of memories -- victorious, hysterical, wistful, and tragic. Now, it’s time to come together to celebrate after 20 years of being apart. Some people want to live it up with their best friends and reconnect with old ones. Some want to take advantage of having a target-rich environment to sell cars, homes, software, and ideas. Others, however, are looking for closure, rekindling old feelings, and good old-fashioned retribution. This reunion seems like the best place to make it happen."

169918.description:
Magia Cum Laude is about a magical test.

The apprentices of the Academy of Babas came together to fulfill their master exam. For this purpose, each of them has received a test spell, which consists of a certain composition of six energy stones. Now they have to collect the stones, which are spread on the floor tiles of the tower.

But this is not as easy as you thought, as well as the other apprentices and one or the other of the masters want to have this energy, too.

Each player mimes a magician that can interfere with the test event in the tower. He is doing this by playing movement cards with which he can move both, each apprentice, as well as the Master. Each Magican would also like that the apprentices also fulfill a secret spell for them and, of course, every magican also has two favorite students, whom he'd like to complete their examination successfully.

The game ends either a magican succeeded in making his two students pass their test or the time has expired. This happens when the deck of movement cards is empty.
The magican who generated the most victory points is the winner.
169918.name: Magia Cum Laude

169919.name: Suspects!
169919.description:
User Description:

A Who-Done-It Adventure Game that tasks you with solving who murdered a film director aboard the Athens to Paris Olympic Express. Six suspects each with their own motive for pushing him from the speeding train but can you decipher the clues and work out who it was before they take your life too.

The game book comes in a kit with a specialised dice, 3 double sided encrypted Detective notebook cards, 4 deciphering and one solution overlay, a suspects gallery and a murder attempt tracker.

The book uses a system which means the murderer, incidents and clues are different each time it is played.

169920.name: Jeżyki
169920.description: A colorful children's game in which hedgehogs try to collect the best fruit and avoid spoiled plums. The players occupy the edges of rows onto which fruit tiles are placed. Once a row is filled up, a player occupying it can grab the tiles and collect points; if the series in a row is a particular configuration (e.g. all fruit of the same type or color) it counts for a higher score. All players can place tiles in all rows, however, and sabotage each other's harvest.

169921.name: Łamisłówka
169921.description:
Łamisłówkais a tile-placement word game played on a field of hexes clustered around numbered fields, where players must place words in twisted lines and the situation on the board is constantly shifting, and can be subject to interpretation. Somewhat reminiscent of diagramless crosswords.

Each player puts down tiles that, in connection to some already on the board, spell out a word; the word has to be declared, as, unlike scrabble, it could be read in many directions, touches letters that aren't part of the word, and so on. Each letter has an assigned number of points, and each word places scores points. Additionally, if one closes the right surrounding a numbered field, one collects as many points as the number signifies. The player with the highest score at the end of the game wins.

169922.name: The Book of Prehistoric Pop-up Board Games
169922.description:
Simple roll dice and move games with a dinosaur theme, in the form of a pop-up book with four three-dimensional boards, a set of paper pawns for each, a spinning dial and an informational booklet.

Very visually attractive and easy to grab for travel, it's a perfect distraction outside the house.

169924.name: Mini Prix
169924.description:
In Mini Prix, you are both team manager & driver for your team. The object of the game is that each player should try to qualify his cars as far up the grid as possible & then beat all the other cars in the race. The winner is the first car to cross the finish line.

A motor racing roll and move with a push your luck element.
Using 3d6 to determine your speed off the line, you can then accelerate & decelerate during your turn in order to safely negotiate the track. Attempting to take a corner at too high a speed results in rolling the dice against your car's current roadworthiness which can result in further damage or even crashing out of the race.

170688.name: Age of Craft Expansion #1: Blueprints and Visitors

27026.name: Chicken Dice Games (チキンダイスゲームズ)

169925.description:
Age of Craft is a combination resource management and tableau building game in which dice are drafted and traded among players as each seeks to build the best city.

A set of six types of basic cards providing resource production and victory points is combined with a set of seven types of randomly chosen action cards to form a supply. Each card represents a type of building that the players may add to their cities.

The active player rolls three dice, chooses one number to keep, then passes the remaining dice clockwise for other players to select. The active player may then negotiate with opponents to trade dice, in order to build up certain combinations of numbers, which represent different kinds of resources. These combinations are then spent to purchase cards to be added to the player's tableau.

The game ends either when one player reaches a total of 20 points or when the last "Mercantile House" card in the supply is purchased. The player with the most points wins.
169925.name: Age of Craft

169926.name: To the Strongest!
169926.description:
From the Introduction:

The rules were originally written to address the author’s passion for refighting ancient battles from Classical Greece, through the period of Macedonian dominance of the Eastern Mediterranean to the rise and eventual fall of the Roman Empire. However, in response to requests from play-testers, they have been extended to cover everything between the biblical era and the late medieval period.

They have been designed so that they can be used for anything from solo play with 100 or so miniatures through to huge games with 3000 plus miniatures and up to 5 players a side. A square grid has been used to promote speed of play. This also enables figures which have been based on different frontages for use with a variety of rule systems to be used together on the same battlefield.

Absolutely no dice are used in To the Strongest! Instead, an innovative (and entertaining) mechanism uses playing cards to activate units, which can each potentially move or fight multiple times during the same turn. Shooting and melees are resolved quickly and decisively, amidst a flurry of playing cards....

Despite their relative simplicity, the author believes that these rules capture the essential flavour of an ancient or medieval battle, and that the more seasoned gamer will find more than enough command decisions to entertain and challenge him. He wishes that players may enjoy very many happy games, and may victory always fall to the strongest!

169927.name: Seirei Kairo Drive
169927.description:
In this cooperative game, players begin by selecting hero cards from among four different colors (representing the elements earth, wind, fire, and water) to form a party. Each player then receives a hand of cards drawn from a central deck, which also represents the players' hit points. The players face a series of monster cards drawn from an enemy deck.

The heroes begin at level one, but they earn tokens during the game that may be spent to level up their attack abilities. Each hero may only attack when the player has played a card matching its color. The card that is played must match either the color or the number of the card that was previously played, though multiple cards may be played under special circumstances.

Monster attacks force players to discard from the central deck, decreasing the available hit points. Leveling up the heroes helps players to reclaim these discarded hit points, essentially "healing" the group.

After facing a series of monsters, the players confront a powerful boss monster in a final battle. The players all win or lose together.

169928.name: Notable Ninth Worlders
169928.description:
From publisher blurb:

An NPC for all seasons

If the Ninth World is weird, then those that live in it are even weirder. It is impossible to live in such a world, and not be touched by it somehow. A few though, rises above petty matters. They are those who wields the world, instead of being wielded by it.

Who are they? What are their secrets? Find out!

Notable Ninth Worlders includes:


A wide variety of NPCs that are readied to use in your campaign. From vicious rivals, informative sources, helpful traders or famous notables.
Advice to how to use the NPC, including suggestions of parts they can play in a campaign and story seeds based on them.
A handy character generator which can help you create unique and weird Ninth Worlds on the spot.

169929.name: Naval Perils: Destinations - Vessels - Creatures
169929.description:
From publisher blurb:

One has not truly explored the Ninth World until they have steped upon a vessel and traveld its seas, its skies and beyond.
A companion to Naval Encounters, Naval Perils contains only Locations, Vessels and Creatures for you to use in your very own Numenera Campaign.

169930.name: New Superpowers: Vintage Villainy
169930.description:
From publisher blurb:

Back in the old days, costumed villains didn’t need cybernetic implants or super soldier drugs to rob a bank or beat a masked vigilante. Ray guns and room sized machines filled with vacuum tubes got the job done! These old machines could defy the laws of physics, but were forgotten by 1960, left to rust in abandoned lairs and hideouts. A few grave robbing base raiders have rediscovered the old tech and discovered that these decades-old machines could remotely deactivate vehicles, turn its user invisible, or disintegrate enemies. Soon enough, vintage super-gadgets made an appearance in the black market.

This supplement covers the history of vintage super gadgets, new rules to create them, and 7 new vintage gadgets. It also includes a new strange skill, the Art of Haphazard Fighting, and a new trap, The Labyrinth Lair.

169932.name: Myrtille
169932.description:
Myrtille is a co-operative game trying to raise awareness of environmental issues. Players will build and explore the small world of Myrtille and complete missions what can have some environmental impact.

The game is made of location card (river, house, beach, forest, garbage dump, shop…), colored pawns, objective cards (which indicates what pawns should go where), two dice (one with colors and one with numbers), and time cards.

Each player has one objective card and a few location cards. The four edges of each location cards have one of three colors.

At the start of the game, one location card is put on the table and will represent the board used by all the players. All colored pawns are placed on this card.

On its turn, a player rolls the two die, and uses only one of them.

If they choose the colored dice, then they add a location card to the board, that will thus get bigger and bigger. To do so, they have to place one of their location card next to a card already on the board such that both adjacent edges have the same color as the die. Also, if the new card is adjacent to more than one card, all adjacent edges must have the same color.

If they choose the numbered dice, then they can move one pawn using as many movement points as shown on the dice, each adjacent card using one movement point. They can only move a pawn whose color matches one of the pawn depicted on their objective card.

An objective card is complete when all pawns depicted on the objective card are on one location card matching the location of the objective card. The group as a whole earns the victory points printed on the objective card.

The game has a limited number of turn, which is tracked using the time cards.

169933.name: Vow of Honor
169933.description:
From publisher blurb:

Uphold your vows to the Tenets of Honor and become a paragon of justice in a broken, cruel world.

The world of Sasara, your home, is broken and depraved. Despots rule over isolated city-states, indifferent to the suffering and squalor of the people. In the shadows of the enigmatic Ruins – the last vestiges of a prosperous era long forgotten – the vile terrorize the innocent few without fear of retribution. Until now.

You are an Arbiter, protector of all that is good in Sasara. Only as you embody the Tenets of Honor will you be empowered to protect the weak, avenge the victims of the wicked, and unlock the knowledge of the ancient Forebears to usher in a new age of peace. Will you take the Vow of Honor? Will you do what is necessary to save your home?

Vow of Honor is a tabletop roleplaying game focusing on the Arbiters of Fasann: icons of justice sworn to the Tenets of Honor.

169934.name: The Best of TV and Movies
169934.description:
The Best of TV and Movies is a party game in the same family as The Logo Board Game. Players or teams have to answer cards with 4 questions on them relating to TV or movies and will move up the track based on the colour of the question answered. The player or team reaching the end first wins.

An advanced variant contains three bonus cards which can interrupt or affect gameplay.

169935.name: Pittile
169935.description:
Pittle is a card drafting and tile placement game where each player tries to complete color patterns on their secret cards for points.

Each player receives an equal number of color tiles. They are then dealt 4 cards from the secret card deck. Each player selects one card and passes the others, continuing like this until everyone has a hand of 4 cards.

The first player then plays a colored tile in the center of the board. Going clockwise, each player plays one colored tile anywhere on the board until all tiles have been played.

Once the final tile has been played, players reveal their secret cards which depict color patterns which have been completed on the board. Points for completed cards are totaled for each player and the player with the highest point total wins.

169936.name: Overruled!
169936.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




This game is still either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between) but IS already available for sale / early access, so CAN BE PLAYED.




Overruled is a 2D multiplayer brawler like no other where the players change the rules as they play, directly influencing the dynamics and direction of combat.

Challenge up to three friends with both local and online multiplayer to a battle – the person with the most points at the end will win the game! But the rules are yours to play with and with over 20 change ‘em up cards, you’ll never know how the battle will go!

Don’t incite the enemy as they are the master of your fate! You could be playing Deathmatch now, but one of your rivals might decide to change it to Swag Bag. Or King of the Hill. Or Capture the Flag.

Everyone dead? Double the respawn timer. Not doing so well by yourself? Turn on teams. Got the swag bag? Double the points you earn.

An ever-growing diverse cast of characters will keep you company as you and your friends battle for victory.

Source: The Developer Website.

169937.name: Real World Racing
169937.description:
REAL WORLD RACING is a top-down racing game using high-quality aerial imagery that lets you race through the world's greatest cities! Speed through London, Paris, Berlin, Rome and many other cities from a new and realistic perspective in a refreshing take on racing simulations.

PHOTOGRAPHIC QUALITY & IMMERSIVE ENVIRONMENT

high resolution aerial photographic images
3D Terrain Enhancements
weather conditions




ACCURATE DRIVING SIMULATION

faithfully modeled car parameters
best control experience in a top-down racer




CAREER, ONLINE MULTIPLAYER, SPECIAL CHALLENGES

full-fledged career mode
online multiplayer up to 16 players
special online challenges
arcade slalom courses, checkpoint races & more




A WEALTH OF CONTENT

80 cars with liveries
50+ tracks with world-famous landmarks
80+ career events
50 collectible challenge cards




Source: The Game Website.

169938.name: WRC Powerslide
169938.description:
WRC Powerslide is the brand new game, developed by Milestone, which mixes amazing and exciting gameplay elements in one game. With a colorful and smart style, this new title offer the chance to try all the WRC licensed elements with an arcade attitude.

GAME MODES: Single Player & Multiplayer

Pick up a car from WRC Class, Class 2 and Class 3, choose between 8 different rallies, compete against your friends/opponents on the same special stage and collect special Power Ups. Thanks to an arcade physic and a brand on top camera the action will be frenetic as never before.

Source: The Game Website.

169939.name: Derrick the Deathfin
169939.description:
Derrick the Deathfin is the world's premiere underwater papercraft game.

It’s a fast-paced arcade action title set in a unique aquatic world made entirely out of paper & card. In the game Derrick rampages around the globe munching on paper creatures and destroying everything he sees under the guise of avenging the death of his parents.

Story

After his parents are brutally turned into soup Derrick finds himself all alone in the deep blue sea...

Luckily this gives him a flimsy pretext to destroy everything in his path in an orgy of rigid destruction! Derrick’s quest takes him all around the globe, through 3 types of level, 4 different continents, 11 vibrant environments and 32 challenging levels. On the way Derrick must race against the clock and his own metabolism, collect diamonds, jump through flaming tyres in the sky, puzzle his way past manmade obstructions and duel to the death with oversized paper baddies.

Source: The Game Website.

169940.name: Dungeon Lurk II - Leona
169940.description:
A Story Driven Action Puzzle Adventure Game. Take your time and explore the environment for clues to puzzles. Zoom in to detailed areas to find secrets that allow you to progress in the game. An adventure full of mystery, obstacles, enemies, stories, battles, puzzles, fun and comedy.

Source: The Game Website.

169941.name: Juris Perjurious
169941.description: In Juris Perjurious, players are wealthy Roman citizens who have gathered at the city forum to discuss new laws. Players are dealt a hidden support card representing an influential citizen who supports their claims. Your goal is to be the first player to collect 11 coins and get your new law approved. Each turn you may trade away your support card or use individual support card powers. Using the ability of a support card is the only way to collect coins needed for victory. Players will claim they have support of various citizens to gain coins, look at other player's cards or they may trade coins or cards, it will be up to all players to decide who may be bluffing. Players can only be stopped by making a public challenge of their support. If you are wrong a small fine is paid to the city Quaestor.

169942.description:
Kogenercja is a game created per request of PGNiG SA - the largest Polish oil and gas exploration and production company.

The players compete in order to create the most efficient thermal-electric power plant. To improve their business, they gather resources needed for the growth of such company and building a power plant. In this game knowledge is as important as an understanding of economy, as players have to answer quiz-type questions in order to advance in the game.

As a game for the entire family, Kogeneracja promotes knowledge about the ways of producing energy and how power plants work.
169942.name: Kogeneracja

169943.name: Cloak & Dagger: Spies and Espionage in The Strange
169943.description:
From publisher blurb:

The World Is Not Enough!

Earth, and the shoals around it, holds thousands of factions, all with different interests. From the major powers with field teams across the Chaosphere, to the lone recursion miner in his own recursion, everyone is trying to gain the upper hand. Those who proceed with violent and direct methods quickly expose themselves to attacks from others; to survive is to remain hidden.

In the Strange, secrecy is the most potent defense, and information the best weapon. A good agent is not one who is rash or bold, but rather calculating, knowing and uses the license to kill only when needed.

Cloak and Dagger includes:

Descriptions of how the factions of the Chaosphere deploy espionage and covert operations to increase their strength and weaken their enemies.
Three recursions which are particularly embroiled in covert activity. The Cold War inspired Divided City, a recursion for the typical movie agent called Agentopia, and Conspiranoia where all conspiracy theories are true.
New foci and artifacts to be used with the three recursions.
An espionage scenario, where the player characters must use all their covert skills to foil a secret plan which could spell doom for millions of people.

169944.name: Cthuloid Bestiary: Lovecraftian Monsters for OSR Games
169944.description:
User summary:

A collection of Lovecraftian Monsters for OSR Games.

169945.name: First Edition Scout
169945.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is the scout character class for the first edition of the world's most popular roleplaying game and all other old-school games compatible with it. The PDF includes the full class description and a custom scout character sheet.

169946.name: First Edition Duellist
169946.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is the duellist character class for the first edition of the world's most popular roleplaying game and all other old-school games compatible with it. This PDF contains the full class description with all relevant tables.

169947.name: First Edition Bard
169947.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is the bard character class for the first edition of the world's most popular roleplaying game and all other old-school games compatible with it. The PDF includes the full class description and a custom bard character sheet.

169948.name: First Edition Knight
169948.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is the knight character class for the first edition of the world's most popular roleplaying game and all other old-school games compatible with it.

169949.name: First Edition Monk
169949.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is the monk character class for the first edition of the world's most popular roleplaying game and all other old-school games compatible with it. The PDF includes the full class description and a custom monk character sheet.

169950.name: First Edition Barbarian
169950.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is the barbarian character class for the first edition of the world's most popular roleplaying game and all other old-school games compatible with it. The PDF includes the full class description and a custom barbarian character sheet.

169951.name: Eastern Exploits: First Edition Samurai
169951.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is the samurai class for the Eastern Exploits supplement of the first edition of the world's oldest roleplaying game and all other old-school games compatible with it. This PDF contains the full class description, including samurai weapons.

169952.name: Zero Edition Fantasy: Samurai
169952.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is the samurai class for the first version of the world's oldest roleplaying game and all other old-school games compatible with it.

This PDF contains the full class description, including samurai equipment, martial arts rules, weapon quality rules and more.

169953.name: Second Edition Samurai
169953.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is the samurai class for the second edition of the world's oldest roleplaying game and all other old-school games compatible with it. This PDF contains the full class description, samurai weapons included.

169954.name: Second Edition Alchemist
169954.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is the alchemist class for the second edition of the world's oldest roleplaying game and all other old-school games compatible with it. This PDF contains the full class description and almost a hundred spells.

169955.name: White Wedding
169955.description:
From publisher blurb:

White Wedding is an EPOCH Christmas Special; a one-shot survival horror scenario.

You are cordially invited to celebrate the wedding of Rebecca Holbrook and Gunther Wald on the winter solstice this December on Holm Island, Massachusetts.

In accordance with family tradition, Rebecca and Gunther will exchange vows at sunset before the black pine.

The Wald family are happy to extend their hospitality to all the wedding guests, and have arranged both accommodation and transport for the wedding. You'll be treated just like one of the family. Be sure to dress warm.

169956.name: Příběhy Impéria: Zkrácená Verze Pravidel
169956.description:
User Comment:

"Zkrácená Verze Pravidel" means, roughly, shortcut version of the rules. This is a short, trial version in PDF available on the publisher's website.

169957.name: Classes of the Lost Spheres: Paramour
169957.description:
From publisher blurb:

That’s The Power of Love.

Introducing the Paramour, a passion-powered character class for the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. Fueled by the Tides of Passion, the Paramour masters powerful Expressions to put their surging emotions to use saving the ones they love. This supplement introduces the new Paramour base class and rules-elements including:

The Heart’s Redoubt, explaining why so many pure-hearted souls might survive their first unintended dungeon.
Over two-dozen Expressions allowing for your Paramour to reflect the unique nature of his or her love including options for entirely morale bases Extroadinary Abilities or towers of supernatural energies unlocked when love is threatened.
Compatibility with Ultimate Psionics rules and Expressions allowing Psionic powers to manifest for your Paramour.
The Heartbound Feat rules expanding the original options from Transcendent 10: Feats of Synergy - Heartbound Heroes including 20 new feats to add to existing characters with the feats from Heartbound Heroes.
Roleplaying advice and options for playing characters in games where in-game romances are frowned on or unavailable.
The Narcissist Archetype for characters who aren’t ready to love at all beyond their own mirrors.




It’s time to take a chance on love.

169958.name: Player Paraphernalia #001
169958.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is a new series of short and ecnomical supplements for the Pathfinder Role Playing Game that offers alternate or enhanced rules that can be used for Pathfinder characters.

This first issue introduces three new feats and two reworked feats that most arcane (and even divine) casters may find invaluable.

169959.name: Arcane Trickster
169959.description:
From publisher blurb:

This edition of “Fantastic Feats” – a series of feats based around a certain theme or subject – is about the prestige class the arcane trickster, rogues who have supplemented their talents for theft with the study of the arcane.

The feats you'll find inside:

Distraction of Light : Sacrifice a spell to blind your opponent
Effective level Increase : Increase effectove level for a cost
Improved Ranged Legerdemain : Your ranged legerdemain is improved but drains your power
Spell Aided Reflexes : Supplement your reflexes with arcane power
Sneak Attack Increase : Sneak attacks are now a bit more deadly
Spell Sacrifice I : Sacrifice stored power for a boost
Spell Sacrifice II : As above, but with more options

rpgseries.26172: RPG Geek Fiasco Playset Contest 2014: Celebrations

169960.name: A Mystery At Midnight
169960.description:
from the first page

Excitement is high for the release of Adelaide Collins' newest thrilling mystery, Blood Among the Waters. In a week, it releases to the public, but tonight, in a grand mansion on Morgan Island, she has gathered a select group of people to attend a very special party: the midnight early unveiling of her book! But what happens when her guests have ambitions and ideas of their own? Why are all the guests from so many different walks of life? And why exactly is it that this feels so much like the plot of a mystery book...?

169961.name: Worlds Without Master (Volume 1, Issue 6 - Dec 2014)
169961.description:
Table of Contents
From Salted Earth - Evan Dicken
The Pebble Ballad - Epidiah Ravachol
Oh, the Beating Drum - Bryant Paul Johnson
A Scoundrel in the Deep (game) - Renato Ramonda & Flavio Mortarino
Three Dozen Experiences Unseen - Epidiah Ravachol

169963.name: Mordheim: City of the Damned
169963.description:
Mordheim: City of the Damned is the first video game adaptation of Games Workshop's cult classic tabletop game Mordheim. Set in the Warhammer World's decimated Empire city, Mordheim: City of the Damned is a turn-based tactical game where you lead warbands into bloody and lethal skirmishes. The game blends RPG elements, fast-paced tactical combat and intricate unit customization in a time wrought by chaos and rivalry where only the strongest survive.

After a twin tailed comet crashed on Mordheim, the City of Damned turned into a terrifying battlefield where rival warbands fight fiercely for the control of key neighborhoods, looking for glory and fortune by acquiring the very valuable Wyrdstone fragments.


Fully customize your Warbands
Choose from a multitude of classes with unique abilities to create unique strategies
Take your troops to battle and test their synergy on the field
Gain experience to unlock Player's special abilities
Spend the Wyrdstones to acquire powerful items and unlock more choices and features
Face other Player's Warbands in head to head skirmishes and compete to own the leaderboards


Source: The Game Website.

169964.name: Warhammer 40,000: Eternal Crusade
169964.description:
Your faction is your family now.
Plan your strategy from orbit, then face death side-by-side with them as you defend strongholds or delve into the Underworld to combat hordes of ravening Tyranids.

Victory is not a thing for a single warrior to claim,
but the result of the fury of armies. Dive into the shifting frontlines and crush your foes by cutting off supply lines, sieging walled fortresses and striking deep into the heart of enemy territory.

Go toe-to-toe in melee,
snipe your enemies from afar or fire into the fray from one of the seats of a gun-loaded Predator tank. Combat in Eternal Crusade ranges from a personal clashing of swords to truly epic warfare involving hundreds of other players.

Choose your allegiances
and background,
then earn hundreds of weapons and accessories drawn from 26 years of 40k lore to craft your perfect warrior.

Source: The Game Website.

169965.description:
Theseus: The Dark Orbit Play Mat . Size :70x80cm
for 2-player game only .
The Limited Mat was selling only with Theseus pre-orders in 2013
169965.name: Theseus: The Dark Orbit – Playmat

169966.name: And Away
169966.description:
And Away is a Tabletop Novel, a solitaire card game.

It is the story of The Wanderer, who is stuck on a desert planet learning Kung-Fu from various teachers, some of which are not human, some of which are very much just a skull, or maybe even a cactus. Above the desert is a green verdant moon called Paradise. The Wanderer is learning Kung-Fu in hopes to somehow defy the impossible and reach this moon.

In the desert player’s will find familiarities to the world of Spell Saga. As if the same world had two reflections.


From the Introduction:

Welcome to the world of And Away: ~ Tabletop Novel~

This is a card game for anyone to play alone. It contains magical items, mysterious places, and dangerous battles. Your hero will have to grow in order to reach the goal of the game, but don’t worry, the hero will grow as the world around them is explored.

This game is also a story. The major plot of And Away is always the same, but what you do during the game and if you survive is up to you.

It can be played an endless amount of times, without ever experiencing the same game twice.

And Away consists of one 41 card deck, which represents the first act of the story. Players will start with all the cards FaceDown in a pile, and two marked “starting cards” flipped FaceUp in a second pile.

Progression through the game occurs by Flipping FaceDown cards and either Acknowledging (bringing them to the FaceUp pile) or Ignoring (Cycling them back under the FaceDown pile) based on the game state until each card in the Deck is FaceUp.

169967.name: Dragon de poche
169967.description:
user summary

Dragon de poche is RPG written in French by John Grümph

It's a small game in the medieval fantastic world. It is simple and fast to play with the objective to be played with no(or very little) preparation. Simply grab 3D6, some friends, generate a scenario and there you go!

boardgamecompilation.195338: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Complete Hero Variant Collection

169968.description:
This official Greater than Games promo card was announced by author Patrick Rothfuss on his blog in November 2014. The character Kvothe is originally from Rothfuss' Kingkiller chronicles series of books.

All sale proceeds are donated to Heifer International, a charity that helps people raise themselves up out of poverty and starvation by promoting education, sustainable agriculture, and local industry all over the world.

From the Official Website

What ho! Kvothe Six-String﻿ enters the multiverse as an alternate hero to play as with the Argent Adept hero deck (contained in the expansion) based on the character from Patrick Rothfuss's Kingkiller Chronicle. Kvothe Six-String has different powers and abilities than the Argent Adept to add a new twist to the game.
169968.name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Kvothe Six-String Argent Adept Promo Card

169969.name: Stellar Reaches (Issue 25 - Winter 2014)
169969.description:
Cover Art: Galaxy and Earthlike World © Bill Carr

From the Contents page:


Letter From The Editor
BITS Task System
Personality Profiles III
Archetypes
Languages Within the Empty Quarter
Lossi Space: Gallery
Lossi Space: Maps & Data
Aesop's Fables
System Flags of the Empty Quarter II
A Barn to House Thee

169970.name: Ruinous
169970.description:
Players use custom dice as pawns to move around a modular hexagonal board with 12 action spaces. When landing on a particular space, the player may acquire an action card from that space. If all cards have been taken, the player may capture the piece of the board itself, leaving fewer spaces for the other players to traverse.

When a player moves through a space that already has an opponent's pawn, the opponent launches an ambush. If the opponent has a higher power level (indicated on the face of the die), the opponent may steal a victory point. However, there are also opportunities for the active player to attack as well. Action cards can be used to alter the face of the die, changing the movement points and power level of the player's pawn.

The game ends at the end of the round in which either all "soul shard" cards (acquired by making a circuit of the board) or "destiny markers" (victory point tokens) are gone from the supply. The player(s) with the most victory points wins.

169971.name: Space Hulk - Space Wolves Chapter
169971.description:
User Summary

The Space Wolves is a fierce space marine chapter. Now you can command a group of these mighty warriors in spacehulk. You can now battle against hordes of genestealers. This game gives you a three mission campaign and full control of 11 unique wolf guard terminators and a rune priest. And off course if you are going to play space wolfs you will need to be ready for the cold...

169972.name: Space Hulk - Harbinger of Torment Campaign
169972.description:
User Summary

'The Harbringer of Torment' is one of those legendary space hulks that just emerged from the warp. But as it comes out of warp it is in a straight collision course with the planet Baal.

Several attempts have been made to change it's course but they where no succes. So now it's up to you and your elite warriors to get inside this space hulk and make sure you stop this space hulk at speed.

The game holds 5 missions: Breakthrough, Heart and Soul, In Control, Gauntlet and Surgical Destruction

Is is designed as a 3 player coöp but can be played with 4. But works as well in Vs mode and single player.

169973.description:
This abstract game uses pieces shaped like macaron cookies in five different colors (pink, blue, brown, green, and yellow) with four different colors of filling (pink, brown, green, and white). The pieces are played on a cloth board with a checkered grid playing area.

The game comes with two sets of rules. For rule set #1 (2 players only), players begin with 7 pink, 5 brown, and 5 green pieces each and take turns placing them on the board. The winner is the first person to line up at least three pieces of the same color in a row. If both players place all of their pieces without getting three in a row, the second player wins.

For rule set #2 (2-4 players), players take turns drawing random pieces from a bag and placing them on the board. If a player manages to surround any number of pieces in a line (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) with two cookies of the same color (one on either end), the player captures all of the surrounded pieces. The captured pieces are worth points at the end of the game. Bonus points are obtained by capturing sets of certain color combinations. When all pieces have been played, the person with the most points wins.
169973.name: Ou-sama no Macaron

169974.name: Space Hulk - Sword of Halcyon Campaign
169974.description:
User Summary

The Sword of Halycon is a space marine vessel that is left in orbit around the planet Falkhan ready to commence it's journey back to it's homeworld. But when it entered the warp it suddenly came to a halt as it lay there in the storm suddenly a space hulp appeared and crashed into the ship. The ship then reported that genestealers where popping up on the scanners. Luckily a group could jump to safety with the escape capsules and picked up by another imperial ship. It is now up to the Blood Angel space marines to recapture the ship.

The campaign contains 5 missions: Impact, Salvage the Bridge, Shut Down, Purify and Inner Sanctum

169975.name: Space Hulk Ascension
169975.description:
Space Hulk: Ascension Edition is a 3D, digital, turn based, strategy game, which builds upon the classic board game experience, and adds new RPG style mechanics, additional weapons, enemy types, an all-new chapter and loads of other new features. Set in the isolated corridors and tomb-like chambers of ancient vessels lost in the graveyard of space, players lead a small force of fearless Space Marine Terminators in a ferocious fight for survival against hordes of predatory, alien Genestealers.

Source: The Game Website.

169976.name: Starship Bridge
169976.description:
From publisher blurb:

This Product is a full-color, 24 x 20 inch map of a Starship Bridge, and includes the VTT (Virtual Table top) files.

DramaScape sells a wide variety of space ships and science fiction map materials. For lower levels of a large starship such as this, our SciFi Floor Tiles can be placed down to make a level and then reconfigured to make new levels. Our Med Bay can be used as the medical treatment facility of the Starship. Our Repair Bay makes an excellent storage warehouse/repair level. Our Launch Bay can be used as the place the starship holds and launches shuttles and small fighters. Our SciFi Bars and SciFi Diner can be used as part of a level for recreation and relaxation. Our Cryo Room can be useful is this is a long distance starship where cold sleep would be necessary. Our free Junction Room can be used as one of the levels the aliens have damaged and can be used as one of the levels for the second half of Impulsive Act.

Our SciFi Characters Miniatures figure flats can be used as the starship crew.

If you enjoy this freebie, our full ship designs such as The Basilisk Lander, The Tug, Vanguard and Vaztstar Shuttles, and The Valkyrie may be of interest to you.

Back Cover Description

“I hope to dissuade you from your present course of action. This species is primitive, barbaric, and militaristic. Even the slightest movement toward their vessel could be seen as an act of provocation.”

Starship Bridge is an interior map of the lifts and bridge of a larger starship, suitable for the bridge command of a group of Player Characters. With thirteen computer stations, this bridge can fit a large group of Player Characters and their allied starship crew.

Starship Bridge is intended for far future science fiction games.

Adventure hook for use with this map:

Impulsive Act: The captain of the starship approaches the vessel of a species known for warlike behavior slowly while hailing them to profess they are friendly and not hostile. As the large starship nears the alien vessel, it swings into action and rams the starship. Breeching tubes rip through the hull as alien marines fight their way to the lifts. The alien marines pour out of the lifts and try to take over the bridge. It’s up to the Player Characters to prevent the aliens from taking over the ship, first by fighting them off of the bridge, and then using the lifts to get to lower levels and drive them back to their ship.

169978.name: Countryside Bus Stop
169978.description:
From publisher blurb:

This full color battlemap is the 230th of a series featuring various terrains. This installment of the battlemap series features a bus stop along a cross country road.

The map is 28 x 30 squares in size, with each 1 inch square scaled to represent 5 feet. It is provided in 12 segments, which need to be assembled, in a single PDF using the letter format.

The product has been updated to include a large gridless JPG image of the map, intended for use with VTT software. It is 4320x4032 pixels in size at 144dpi.

169979.name: Space Hulk - Defilement of Honour Campaign
169979.description:
User Summary

The Defilement of honour isn't a regular space hulk, unlike the others this one isn't caught by the whims of the warpspace and it's storms it can be controlled and steered throught he warp. It is now up to the blood angels to stop this space hulk and examine it with the ultimate goal: destroy it! Scans however learned that there are two groups of genestealers aboard the hulk. Time to deal with them.

The campaign consists of 5 parts: Bait, Stop the Tide, Shut Down, Rearward and Take Control

169980.name: Omkapp i luften
169980.description:
Typical roll-and-move game on the theme "airplane racing". Roll one die, and at landing on certain fields the player must for example move back or forwards or sit one round out. First to land on field #60 is the winner. If you bet money on the planes, the winner get 2/3 of the cash pool; second get the rest.
The game is in Norwegian, probably printed in the late 1920s or early 1930s.

169981.name: Moderne kappestrid
169981.description:
Typical roll-and-move game on the theme "modern racing". You must chose to be either a runner, an automobile driver or an airplane pilot. Roll one die, and at landing on certain fields the player must for example move back or forwards or sit one round out. First to land on field #40 is the winner. If you bet money, the winner get 2/3 of the cash pool; second get the rest.
The game is in Norwegian, probably printed in the late 1920s or early 1930s.

169982.name: Fottball
169982.description:
Typical roll-and-move game on the theme "Association football". Roll one die, and at landing on certain fields the player must for example move backwards or forwards or sit one round out. First to land on field #50 is the winner.
The game is in Norwegian/Danish, probably printed in the late 1920s. The title is misspelled "Fottball" instead of "Fotball". Also, the label "Amuso" is printed on the box cover.

169983.name: Trick or Trick
169983.description:
Players are dealt cards depicting girls, ghosts, or fairies. On each turn, one player selects an opponent and plays a card face down to "visit" that opponent for Halloween, saying "Trick or Treat." The opponent must decide whether to hand over a piece of candy or suffer a "trick."

The results of the "trick" are different depending on the identity of the card. If the card is a girl, the opponent receives two pieces of candy. If the card is a ghost, the opponent must give two pieces of candy to the card's owner. If the card is a fairy, the opponent and the card's owner both must give up half their candy to the supply.

If the opponent elects the "treat" option, the active player may request a second piece of candy...but if so, the opponent may choose to turn the played card back on its owner. The game ends when all cards have been played. The player(s) with the most candy wins.
